data.description: Prefixes and suffixes analisys of text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Prefixes and Suffixes are a very important part of Natural Language
    Processing. This module provides an easy way to extract them from
    text, along with their frequency.

    This module is currently being used by (at least) Lingua::Identify.

    Currently, it is probably a bit slow with bigger texts (haven't
    tried, just guessing), but that will be solved real soon, by
    changing the algorithm and using a little bit of C.
